items.titolo: US exports from Taiwan now exceed exports from China for the first time in decades — AI gold rush fuels 93.5% jump in advanced system exports
items.descrizione: Recent trade statistics indicate that Taiwan now supplies more goods to the U.S. than China does, but this is only a part of the picture, as Taiwan is rapidly increasing its exports to everywhere in the world.

items.titolo: Intel shifts customer support to AI-powered assistant after scaling back phone support — “Ask Intel” system built on Microsoft Copilot Studio
items.descrizione: Intel has launched what it’s calling “Ask Intel,” a new AI-powered support assistant built with Microsoft Copilot Studio.

items.titolo: L’AI è pronta per la matematica? Gemini alla prova con 700 problemi irrisolti
items.descrizione: Da qualche mese una raccolta online di problemi matematici è diventata il banco di prova per testare le capacità astratte dell’intelligenza artificiale.

items.titolo: User accidentally gains control of over 6,700 robot vacuums while tinkering with their own device to enable control with a PlayStation controller — security flaw reveals floor plans and live video feeds
items.descrizione: An AI strategist used Claude Code to reverse engineer his robot vacuum and control it with a PlayStation controller, but it accidentally gave him control of thousands of similar devices spread all across the world.
